normalised: Social Media and Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics Get a Desi Twist!

unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics Get a Desi Twist!**
normalised: Hey folks! Ever wondered if all those 'likes' from Jaipur to Jamshedpur are *actually* legit? Well, follower analytics are getting a whole lot smarter, helping brands separate the asli fans from the nakli ones.

unnormalised: Hey folks! Ever wondered if all those 'likes' from Jaipur to Jamshedpur are *actually* legit? Well, follower analytics are getting a whole lot smarter, helping brands separate the asli fans from the nakli ones.
normalised: Forget just counting numbers! Think location breakdowns to pinpoint engagement hotspots (hello, Hyderabad!), and interest analysis to see if your content *really* resonates with, say, college kids cramming for exams at three A M.

unnormalised: Forget just counting numbers! Think location breakdowns to pinpoint engagement hotspots (hello, Hyderabad!), and interest analysis to see if your content *really* resonates with, say, college kids cramming for exams at 3:00 AM.
normalised: These new tools can even flag suspicious activity – sudden follower spikes, bot accounts, and engagement patterns that scream "scam!" – protecting brands from wasting their precious rupees on dud influencers. Imagine finding out that eighty percent of an influencer's audience is actually based in Pakistan on twenty sixth january two thousand and twenty four! Awkward, right?

unnormalised: These new tools can even flag suspicious activity – sudden follower spikes, bot accounts, and engagement patterns that scream "scam!" – protecting brands from wasting their precious Rs. on dud influencers. Imagine finding out that 80% of an influencer's audience is actually based in Pakistan on 26/01/2024! Awkward, right?
normalised: Experts at I I T Delhi are even working on algorithms to predict which content will go viral, just in time for Diwali celebrations on twelfth november. So, ditch the guesswork and embrace the data! Time to get real about those followers, folks. After all, engagement is King!

unnormalised: Experts at IIT Delhi are even working on algorithms to predict which content will go viral, just in time for Diwali celebrations on 12/11. So, ditch the guesswork and embrace the data! Time to get real about those followers, folks. After all, engagement is King!
